com.relteq.sirius.simulator
Class _Event

java.lang.Object
  com.relteq.sirius.jaxb.Event
      com.relteq.sirius.simulator._Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceComponent, InterfaceEvent, java.lang.Comparable
public abstract class _Event
extends com.relteq.sirius.jaxb.Event
implements java.lang.Comparable, InterfaceComponent, InterfaceEvent

Simple implementation of InterfaceEvent.

This is the base class for all events contained in a scenario. It provides a full default implementation of InterfaceEvent so that extended classes need only implement a portion of the interface.

Method Detail

validate

public boolean validate()
Description copied from interface: InterfaceComponent
Validate the component.

Called once by ObjectFactory.createAndLoadScenario(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, double, double, double). It checks the validity of the configuration parameters. Events are validated at their activation time. All other components are validated when the scenario is loaded.

Specified by:
validate in interface InterfaceComponent
Returns:
true if the data is valid, false otherwise.

reset

public void reset()
Description copied from interface: InterfaceComponent
Prepare the component for simulation.

Called by _Scenario.run(int) each time a new simulation run is started. It is used to initialize the internal state of the component.

Because events are state-less, the _Event class provides a default implementation of this method, so it need not be implemented by other event classes.

Specified by:
reset in interface InterfaceComponent

update

public void update()
Description copied from interface: InterfaceComponent
Update the state of the component.

Called by _Scenario.run(int) at each simulation time step. This function updates the internal state of the component.

Because events are state-less, the _Event class provides a default implementation of this method, so it need not be implemented by other event classes.

Specified by:
update in interface InterfaceComponent
